hooks.command: [[ "$TOOL_INPUT" =~ "git push".*"--force-with-lease" ]] && exit 0; [[ "$TOOL_INPUT" =~ (rm[[:space:]]+-rf[[:space:]]+/|git[[:space:]]+push.*--force([[:space:]]|$)|drop[[:space:]]+database) ]] && echo 'Dangerous command blocked' >&2 && exit 2 || true

[[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" =~ (node_modules|\.next|dist|out|\.claude/) ]] && exit 0; npx --yes prettier --write --log-level=error "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|mjs|cjs)$ ]] && npx --yes eslint --fix --quiet "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true
